foreignData.name: Wächter von Oboro
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger
Modifizierte Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, können angreifen, als ob sie nicht Verteidiger hätten.

foreignData.name: Guardianas de Oboro
foreignData.text:
Defensor.
Las criaturas modificadas que controlas pueden atacar como si no tuvieran la habilidad de defensor.

foreignData.name: Vigiles d'Oboro
foreignData.text:
Défenseur
Les créatures modifiées que vous contrôlez peuvent attaquer comme si elles n'avaient pas le défenseur.

foreignData.name: Guardiani di Oboro
foreignData.text:
Difensore
Le creature modificate che controlli possono attaccare come se non avessero difensore.

foreignData.name: 朧宮の守り
foreignData.text:
防衛
あなたがコントロールしていて改善されているすべてのクリーチャーは、防衛を持たないかのように攻撃できる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ムーンフォーク・侍

foreignData.name: 오보로의 수호자
foreignData.text:
수비태세
당신이 조종하며 수정된 생물들은 수비태세가 없는 것처럼 공격할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Guardiãs de Oboro
foreignData.text:
Defensor
As criaturas modificadas que você controla podem atacar como se não tivessem defensor.

foreignData.name: Стражницы Оборо
foreignData.text:
Защитник
Измененные существа под вашим контролем могут атаковать, как если бы у них не было способности Защитника.

foreignData.name: 胧宫守护者
foreignData.text:
守军
由你操控且有饰装的生物能视同不具守军异能地进行攻击。

foreignData.name: 朧宮守護者
foreignData.text:
守軍
由你操控且有飾裝的生物能視同不具守軍異能地進行攻擊。

name: Guardians of Oboro
originalText:
Defender
Modified creatures you control can attack as though they didn't have defender.

rulings.text: An Aura controlled by an opponent does not cause a creature you control to be modified.
A creature with a counter on it is considered modified no matter what kind of counter it is or which player put it on that creature.
A creature that is equipped is considered modified no matter who controls the Equipment that's attached to it.
Only creatures can be modified. If a modified creature stops being a creature, it is no longer considered modified.

text:
Defender
Modified creatures you control can attack as though they didn't have defender. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
